name: Otherside (RahilDev)
description:
An indie puzzle platformer that requires you to switch between dimensions to solve the various puzzles. You have to figure out what part of the world is real while what is not?

The controls are given below. Also please change the settings to the max in the settings menu for a better experience.

Will you reach the otherside?

**WIP**

Controls:-

WASD - Movement;

F- Change Dimensions;

E- Interact;
